headline: Emotional, tense moments during House Judiciary Subcommittee hearing in Charlotte on violent crime
description: Stephen Federico gives powerful testimony about Logan's murder and need for criminal justice reform at House Judiciary hearing.

headline: 'That day, I could not be her hero': Father says after daughter is fatally shot in South Carolina
description: National coverage of Stephen Federico's emotional account of losing his daughter Logan.

headline: Logan Federico murder: Suspect Alexander Dickey had 40 charges before killing
description: Investigation reveals suspect's extensive criminal history with 39 arrests and 25 felonies before Logan's murder.

headline: SC AG wants death penalty for suspect in Logan Federico case, assigns senior attorney to assist
description: Attorney General Alan Wilson calls for death penalty in Logan's case.

headline: Columbia police investigate murder of Logan Federico
description: Initial breaking news coverage of Logan's murder in Columbia, SC.

headline: Celebration of life held for NC woman killed in Columbia
description: Over 200 people gather wearing pink to honor Logan's memory at memorial service.

headline: Remembering Logan Federico
description: Coverage of Logan's celebration of life at Cedar Creek Ranch in Waxhaw, NC.

headline: US Rep. Ralph Norman calls for SC solicitor to be impeached over Logan Federico case
description: Congressional representative calls for accountability in prosecution of Logan's case.

headline: Father of slain 22-year-old wants federal prosecutors to handle daughter's murder case
description: Stephen Federico calls for federal prosecution after state court system failures.

headline: SC officials defend prosecution of Logan Federico's killer
description: South Carolina officials respond to criticism over handling of Logan's case.

headline: Logan Federico Murder: S.C. Attorney General, Solicitor Clash Over Death Penalty
description: Detailed coverage of legal battles over prosecution strategy in Logan's case.

headline: Grieving dad slams lawmakers for crime policies that freed daughter's suspected career criminal killer
description: National coverage of Stephen's advocacy for bail reform and criminal justice policy changes.

headline: Special House hearing in Charlotte eyes violent crime after high-profile killings in the Carolinas
description: Coverage of House Judiciary Subcommittee hearing featuring Stephen's testimony.

headline: What Happened to Logan Federico?
description: In-depth coverage of the case details and Logan's story.

headline: Families demand action on violent crime at Charlotte congressional hearing
description: Video coverage of congressional hearing on violent crime including Stephen's testimony.
